DebtorName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to debit funds.

DebtorAddress.description: Debtor address that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services.

DebtorBIC.description: Debtor Business Identifier Code if initiating party is an organization.

DebtorPrivateIdentification.description: Either 'Date and Place of Birth' or one occurrence of 'Other' is allowed if initiating party is an individual.

DebtorIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the debtor to which a debit entry will be made as a result of the transaction.

EndToEndId.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

InstructedAmount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party.

CreditorName.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to credit funds.

CreditorAddress.description: Creditor address that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services.

CreditorBIC.description: Financial institution servicing an account for the creditor

CreditorPrivateIdentification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a person.

CreditorIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the creditor to which a credit entry will be posted as a result of the payment transaction.

Reference.description: Reference provided by the debtor for the sepa transfer.
